headlines.description: Liverpool started their title challenge with a 2-2 draw at newly promoted Fulham on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Nunez, Salah score as Liverpool held by Fulham

headlines.description: Bournemouth made a winning return to the Premier League by beating Aston Villa 2-0 at home on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Bournemouth grab 2-0 win over Aston Villa

headlines.description: An own goal by defender Rayan Ait-Nouri gave Leeds United a 2-1 win over Wolverhampton Wanderers in their opening Premier League game of the season.
headlines.shortLinkText: Wolves' Ait-Nouri scores own goal to hand Leeds 2-1 win

headlines.description: Newcastle United made a comfortable start to the new season thanks to goals from Fabian Schar and Callum Wilson in a 2-0 win over Nottingham Forest.
headlines.shortLinkText: Dominant Newcastle spoil Forest's top-flight return

headlines.description: Tottenham Hotspur underlined their credentials as a team capable of a Premier League title challenge with a confident 4-1 defeat of Southampton.
headlines.shortLinkText: Tottenham crush Southampton in impressive win

headlines.description: — Jorginho’s late first-half penalty was enough to give Chelsea a 1-0 victory over Everton in the English Premier League on Saturday for the London club's first win at Goodison Park in five visits.
headlines.shortLinkText: Jorginho gives Chelsea 1-0 opening win over Everton in EPL
